entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
